# Sea-Bird SBE 37-SMP-ODO MicroCAT

## Overview

The SBE 37-SMP-ODO is a high-accuracy CTD (Conductivity, Temperature, Depth) sensor with an integrated dissolved oxygen sensor, manufactured by Sea-Bird Scientific.

## Key Features

- **Manufacturer**: Sea-Bird Scientific
- **Model**: SBE 37-SMP-ODO
- **Type**: CTD with Dissolved Oxygen
- **Deployment**: Hull-mounted, forward of keel at 0.6m depth

## Measured Variables

- Temperature (TEMP_SBE37)
- Salinity (SAL_SBE37)
- Conductivity (COND_SBE37)
- Dissolved Oxygen Concentration (O2_CONC_SBE37)
- Oxygen Saturation (O2_SAT_SBE37)

## Specifications

| Parameter | Range | Accuracy |
|-----------|-------|----------|
| Temperature | -5 to +35°C | ±0.002°C |
| Conductivity | 0 to 9 S/m | ±0.0003 S/m |
| Oxygen | 0-500 µmol/kg | ±2% or 2 µmol/kg |

## Links

- [Manufacturer Product Page](https://www.seabird.com/sbe-37smp-odo-microcat-ctd/product?id=60762467708)
- [Sea-Bird Scientific](https://www.seabird.com/)

## Deployment Notes

This sensor is typically deployed on Saildrone vehicles at 0.6m depth, hull-mounted forward of the keel. Data is averaged over 10-minute intervals.
